image_directory: This directory has raw data under image_directory/case_00/ [ex] $HOME/Desktop/data/Abdomen
save_directory: createDownSamplePatch.py saved image or array in this directory, save_directory/case_00 [ex] $HOME/Desktop/data/patch/Abdomen/32-512-512-1/all/image
label_patch_size: Shape combNet outputs. creatDownSamplePatch.py create patch for label_patch_size / 2**num_down. If label_patch_size is 512-512-32 and num_down is 2, createDownSamplepatch.py outputs 128-128-8. [ex]512-512-32
is_label: If Yes, input image is label, if No, input image is raw data [ex] Yes or No
